name: User logon report
description: The most critical auditing requirement of an organization is to monitor information related to user login, whether it be for login failures, user login activity, etc.

reports.name: Logon failures based on users
reports.description: This report is based on specific actions, data on Logon failures, logon failures based on users, etc.

reports.name: Failures due to Bad User Name
reports.description: This report is based on specific actions, with data on Logon failures, failures due to Bad User Name.

reports.name: Failures due to Bad Password
reports.description: This report is based on specific actions, with data on Logon failures, failures due to Bad Password.

reports.name: Logon Activity based on IP Address
reports.description: This report is based on the login activity according to the computer's IP address where the action was executed.

reports.name: Users logged into multiple computers
reports.description: This report is based on the login activity according to Users logged into multiple computers.

reports.name: User Logon Activity
reports.description: This report is based on the user's login activity per date.

reports.name: Recent User Logon Activity
reports.description: This report is based on the user's login activity in the last 15 minutes.
